channel.title: cordova on 酷卡派
channel.description: Recent content in cordova on 酷卡派

item.title: First
item.description: cordova改wkwebview打包ios应用，直接启动不了 cordova改为wkwebview后启动不了了，提示如下错误： *** Terminating app due to uncaught exception 'NSUnknownKeyException', reason: '[<WKWebViewConfiguration 0x11de16c30> setValue:forUndefinedKey:]: this class is not key value coding-compliant for the key _alwaysRunsAtForegroundPriority.' 百度大法找个各种方法都不管用，最后这样搞定的，原因不知道 NSString* str = @"X2Fsd2F5c1J1bnNBdEZvcmVncm91bmRQcmlvcml0eQ=="; 改为： NSString* str = @"YWx3YXlzUnVuc0F0Rm9yZWdyb3VuZFByaW9yaXR5";
